name: Approval Completed
description: Send a notification to a requester indicating they have an approval request that has been completed.
subject: An Approval Request For $approvalName Has Been $approvalStatus
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

An approval request for $approvalName that was submitted #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '' && $requestee.identityID == $__recipient.id) on your behalf by $requester.name #else by you #end has been $approvalStatus.toLowerCase().

To take action on or view the status of your approval requests, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$requesterPath


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
